Sword Art Online Alicization
              Episode 7            – Swordcraft Academy
paragraph:
Two years have gone by since Kirito and Eugeo left Rulid Village. In the capital city, Centoria, both boys have attained              
           their goal of being admitted to the North Centoria Imperial Swordcraft Academy.
